name: nginx no file
description: fail2ban regex for nginx no file
content: 2015/04/01 06:53:50 [error] 5495#0: *108187 open() "/usr/share/nginx/html/cgi-bin/authLogin.cgi" failed (2: No such file or directory), client: 80.38.244.253, server: 203.39.12.222, request: "GET /cgi-bin/authLogin.cgi HTTP/1.1", host: "127.0.0.1"
author: Sunil Sattiraju
pattern: /\[error\] \S* \S* open\(\) \S* failed \(2: No such file or directory\), client: \S*, server: \S*, request: "GET \S* HTTP\S* host: "\S*"*$/g
